name: Qiao mai feng zhang
description: In the 1990s, the two girls and a boy who first entered the society tested the incredible destiny they experienced in the pursuit of a new life. In the flourishing 1990s, they rose up with the dream and they survived.

review.author: liedtkepaulina
review.heading: Great movie with censorship concessions (?)
review.reviewBody: Up to a point, it is a great movie with beautiful cinematography and valid questions about important social issues, deserving of 8 starts, by my standards. However, the message of this movie is not unambiguously positive, therefore appropriate ending and commentary had to be added. If this was a way of getting this movie through, so be it.
